CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many chords are in this chord chart?
How many outer arcs are in this chord chart?

SRP.Q: In the chord chart, what is the next arc in the clockwise direction from arc Potatoes?
SRP.A: The next arc clockwise from arc Potatoes is arc {Corn}.

SRP.Q: In the chord chart, what is the next arc in the counterclockwise direction from arc Sugarcane?
SRP.A: The next arc counterclockwise from arc Sugarcane is arc {Oats}.

VPR.Q: Which arc has the largest output flow in this chord chart?
Which arc has the largest input flow in this chord chart?

VE.Q: What is the flow value from Potatoes to Oats in the chord chart?
What is the flow value from Soybeans to Sugarcane in the chord chart?

EVJ.Q: What is the maximum flow value between Corn and Oats in the chord chart?
EVJ.A: The maximum flow value between Corn and Oats is {138}.

EVJ.Q: What is the minimum flow value between Sugarcane and Soybeans in the chord chart?
EVJ.A: The minimum flow value between Sugarcane and Soybeans is {363}.

EVJ.Q: What is the maximum flow value in the chord chart?
What is the minimum flow value in the chord chart?

SC.Q: What is the total flow output from Oats?
SC.A: The total flow output from Oats is {212}.

SC.Q: What is the total flow input by Sugarcane?
SC.A: The total flow input by Sugarcane is {363}.

NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow greater than 524? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {686} from {Sugarcane} to {Soybeans}.

NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow less than 85? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {80} from {Soybeans} to {Corn}, a flow of {68} from {Corn} to {Soybeans}.

NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow between 112 and 155? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {138} from {Corn} to {Oats}, a flow of {121} from {Oats} to {Corn}.

NC.Q: Which flow is larger: from Oats to Potatoes or from Potatoes to Oats?
NC.A: The flow from {Potatoes} to {Oats} is larger.

NC.Q: Which flow is the largest: from Corn to Soybeans, from Oats to Potatoes, or from Corn to Oats?
NC.A: The flow from {Corn} to {Oats} is the largest.

MSR.Q: Which category has the highest proportion of outgoing flow relative to its total flow?
MSR.A: The category with the highest proportion of outgoing flow relative to its total flow is {Sugarcane}.

MSR.Q: Which pair has the strongest chord connection in this chord chart?
MSR.A: The strongest chord connection is between {Soybeans} and {Sugarcane}.

VA.Q: To minimize the crossings between chords, please reorder the outer arcs and list the reorder arc order in clockwise direction.
VA.A: The reordered arc order in clockwise direction is: {Arc Potatoes, Arc Soybeans, Arc Sugarcane, Arc Oats, Arc Corn}.
